Britney Spears/Instagram

Britney Spears has sparked fears that she is "not allowed" to speak freely. The 38-year-old pop princess just went Q&A in an Instagram video answering fan questions ranging from her favorite food to her top travel destination â€“ while Britney got the thumbs-up for admitting that the humble chili dog tops her food list, her 24.8 million followers were left with one unanswered question.

Britney, who has been repeatedly asked if she is "okay" as her own Instagram followers fear both for her mental health and her status amid her 2008-commenced conservatorship, had ignored addressing the much-debated issue. More below.
